about_the_game:
Ancient Evil is a tactical RPG with puzzle elements where you will have to go through three parts of ancient lands, fighting powerful guardians and solving the secrets of dungeons. During the game you will need to collect weapons, armor and potions, avoid traps and use the environment to win. Each level is a unique challenge where not only strength but also strategy is important. Enemies become stronger and the tasks become more difficult, requiring the player to make the right decisions under limited time. The game contains elements of puzzles, combat and tactics, which creates a deep and exciting gameplay.

Game Features:

  • Puzzles and Strategic Choices: The game combines puzzle and strategy elements, where every decision you make can impact your success.

  • Dark Fantasy Atmosphere: Inspired by dark fantasy worlds, the game immerses you in an atmosphere of danger and mystery.

  • Use of Traps and the Environment: Traps on the level can be both your friend and your enemy, requiring attention and calculation.

  • Variety of Enemies: Each Guardian requires a unique approach, be it combat, use of the environment or cunning.
